title: Naltrexone implant helps HIV patients with opioid dependence prevent relapse

title_detail.value: Naltrexone implant helps HIV patients with opioid dependence prevent relapse

summary: A new study shows that a naltrexone implant placed under the skin was more effective at helping HIV-positive patients with an opioid addiction reduce relapse and have better HIV-related outcomes compared to the oral drug.

summary_detail.value: A new study shows that a naltrexone implant placed under the skin was more effective at helping HIV-positive patients with an opioid addiction reduce relapse and have better HIV-related outcomes compared to the oral drug.
